name: Scotts Scotts Turf Builder Ezseed 10 Pound 17528-17428 Pack of 4

reviews.name: Scotts EZ Seed Sun & Shade Combination Mulch, Grass Seed & Fertilizer, 10 lbs
reviews.reviewText: There is no room for questioning whether this product will have the results you want..........IT WORKS EACH AND EVERY TIME!! Another bonus "ez seed" provided, for us, is the grass appears stronger, thicker and more resilent than other grass seed. Love, love this product!!! I only wish it was alittle less in price.....especially in these bad economic times.....would help to give people something lushous to look at while living super frugally. Great product, Scotts Company!!
reviews.title: "ez seed" is a product you CAN count on!

reviews.name: Scotts EZ Seed Sun & Shade Combination Mulch, Grass Seed & Fertilizer, 10 lbs
reviews.reviewText:
I strictly followed the instructions, making sure to loosen the soil well with a garden weasel (with rotating tines). I spread the EZ Seed as instructed, enough so that some ground was still visible, made sure that the area was kept moist, and made sure not to disturb the area.
It's been over 3 weeks now, and I've given up on expecting to get anything more than a few thin blades of grass.
Last year, I seeded some areas with my own mixture of seed, starter fertilizer, and peat moss, and had much better success. I should have done the same this year, but only needed a few small areas to repair. Feeling that Scotts was a superior product with a well-known trusted name, I tried the EZ Seed. Sorry to say, it was a waste of time and money.
reviews.title: Very Disappointed

reviews.name: Scotts EZ Seed Sun & Shade Combination Mulch, Grass Seed & Fertilizer, 10 lbs
reviews.reviewText: I had a patch of yard that had several years earlier been a small garden but I now wanted to grow grass in the area. Scotts EZ Seed worked great!
reviews.title: EZ Seed

reviews.name: Scotts EZ Seed Sun & Shade Combination Mulch, Grass Seed & Fertilizer, 10 lbs
reviews.reviewText: I have used this product many times over the last 4 years in NY to fill trouble spots caused by fungus, dog waste or other unknown reasons. The grass has always grown back very fast as long as the area is watered. I just got two bare areas 95% filled in within two weeks.
reviews.title: Quick growing

reviews.name: Scotts EZ Seed Sun & Shade Combination Mulch, Grass Seed & Fertilizer, 10 lbs
reviews.reviewText: This product worked very well. I've read the other reviews but maybe they seeded at the temp. Bermuda grass should be seeded with ground temps in the high 70s and 80s. I saw grass grow in the first week and by the third week I had a great green lawn.
reviews.title: It was easy
